directions: Stir together crust ingredients and press onto bottom and 1 inch up side of a buttered 24-centimeter springform pan. Fill right away or chill up to 2 hours.
ingredient_list: 8 oz fine-quality bittersweet chocolate (not unsweetened), chopped
1 1/2 cups (5 ounces) finely ground cookies such as chocolate wafers
title: chocolate caramel cheesecake
